name: Home
tagline: a weblog about my programming adventures
body:
This is my personal blog, where I take notes and write my thoughts about different subjects: mainly mastering python and wrapping my head around functional programming. 

You can:

[Follow me on GitHub](github.com/petr-tik)

[Tweet at me](https://twitter.com/petr_tik)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
